10th Citizens’ Press Conference
Theme: ‘Please Don't Congratulate Us on a Hollow Victory - the Fight for Freedom Continues’
Date: 6th Sept
Time: HKT 1PM
.
The reality of the ‘Anti-Extradition’ Movement having evolved from a political crisis into a humanitarian crisis will be presented at this Press Conference. The importance of international attention from the democratic world on the situation in Hong Kong will also be discussed. A foreign guest has been invited to appear at this Press Conference. The Team hopes to use this opportunity to reiterate the imperative to persist with the 5 Demands, and to display to the world the unfaltering determination of the Hong Kong people, and to encourage the international community to continue to stand on the right side in this unfinished fight for freedom.
